title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated parmesan cheese.
Drain spaghetti and mix with bacon.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Fry onions, then add tomato puree and cook.
Add grilled chicken and simmer with cream.
